column1: Kata Robata////Went on a Thursday night and was seated right away. The restaurant quickly started to pick up. Got loud very quickly
column2: so if you want to converse with someone you need to talk loudly. The waiter never brought my iced tea either. Food presentation was nice and it tasted good. Would I come back? Maybe if I was in the area
column3: but I wouldn't come out of my way to go here.
